title: Lottery Ticket, John Voight, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Lottery Ticket, John Voight, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Today we show love to all the food trucks out there.  Ever want to do a #2 on your bosses desk?  We have a story for you!  Actor John Voight is at the center of controversy for some comments about racism and Trump.  Singer Khalid gives hope to the city of El Paso.  The has been a rule implemented when it comes to sports agents because of the actions of Lebron's agent.  Trump visits Dayton and El Paso and is met with protests.  Sheryl Underwood is here and she compares and contrasts the statements of 44 and 45.  Miss Carla talks about Real Housewives of Potomac airing footing of the alleged sexual assault.  Is Kylie Jenner getting married or nah?  Today in J's What We Learned Today, everyone but Fool #2 learns something and it is must hear.  Have a good day!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
